amendment.description: To treat costs for covered drugs as incurred costs without regard to whether the individual or another person, including a State program or other third-party coverage, has paid for such costs.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 976 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 43. Record Vote Number: 233.

Amendment SA 976 proposed by Senator Rockefeller. (consideration: CR S8324-8330; text: CR S8325-8326) To treat costs for covered drugs as incurred costs without regard to whether the individual or another person, including a State program or other third-party coverage, has paid for such costs.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 976 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 43. Record Vote Number: 233.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 976 proposed by Senator Rockefeller.
